A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this movie\, until the ending. The ending is just meh. I guess the second chapter of a trilogy is supposed to end on a depressing note but still have a bit of hope (just like attack of the clones and empire strikes back.) However I wanted more from this trilogies second act and it saddens me that this movie ended the way it did. Still\, there are so many good scenes and some not so good that will leave you scratching your head. A few of the subplot elements and scenes are questionable. Overall\, it’s a good movie on the verge of being great. Casual fans will definitely like it\, it’s just the more hardcore fans that might find problems with it.
